name: OutSplit
description: OutSplit is a simple puzzle game in which your task shift cubes.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7/8/10 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Video card must be 256 MB or more and should be a DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0
recommended_requirements: OS: 7/8/10 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Video card must be 256 MB or more and should be a DirectX 9
